# Week 3: 17 - 23 November 2025

## Algorave Experiments & Visual Ideas: My Idea

Algorave with sound created by Strudel REPL

- The language provides different ways to visualize sound patterns
- Values like `lpf`, `duck`, `attack`, `decay`, `room` can alter visuals
- I enjoy seeing the DJ/performer with video as context → can create filters on top of live video

### Photos

<img src="assets/images/week3_pegassi.png" alt="Pegassi Full Circle Performance" width="600">

### Videos

Full Circle — Sweet Nothing Event, Antwerp Expo:

This is an example of what i mean with filters ontop of live videos while the dj in playing

## Feedback

Project is approved; no further consultation required.


## CODING OF THE WEEK

### Chill Vibes

<iframe src="https://strudel.cc/#%2BITQsIDxoaD4hMl0iKS5wb3N0Z2FpbigyKS5lbmQoMC4yKS5ocGYoMC43NSkKICAuX3B1bmNoY2FyZCgp" width="100%" height="500px"></iframe>

### HOLY SESSION

This is a session that i build myself and im really proud of it. This is a good starter for anyone to start experimenting with these values. You can uncomment part that have either "//" or "_". To update the RPL (on mac) you press ctrl+enter. Have fun!

<iframe src="https://strudel.cc/#%%3D%3D" width="100%" height="500px"></iframe>

### Getting Better Set

Have fun with this one to! I added some more sliders for certain values to have a more versitile environment.

<iframe src="https://strudel.cc/#%3D%3D" width="100%" height="500px"></iframe>
